書名: 臺灣閩南語朗讀文章選輯

段: 頭家出錢鋪輕便，工人搬柴較好輦；
Thau5-ke chhut-chinn5 phou khin-pian7, kang-lang5 poann chha5 khah ho2 lian2;
煞工無穡閒仙仙，齣頭隨換囡仔演；
soah-kang bo5 sit eng5-sian-sian, chhut-thau5 sui5 oann7 gin2-a2 ian2;
大大細細跤手賤，起起落落耍袂倦；
toa7-toa7 se3-se3 kha-chhiu2 chian7, khi2-khi2-loh8-loh8 sng2 be7 sian7;
好耍來回無幾遍，時間短短嘛過癮；
ho2-sng2 lai5-hoe5 bo5 kui2 pian3, si5-kan te2-te2 ma7 koe3-gian3;
車廂會幌綑相連，搖籃落眠是當然；
chhia-siunn e7 hainn3 khun2 sio-lian5, io5-na5 loh8-bin5 si7tong-jian5;
幌搖道理攏無變，爽暢感覺誠明顯。
hainn3-io5 to7-li2 long2 bo5 pian3, song2-thiong3 kam2-kak chiann5 beng5-hian2.

阮老爸是鋸木工廠的工人，規家口仔攏tua3 佇工寮內底，面頭前是囥柴箍的大埕，有箍一大輾轉的鐵枝路佮輕便車圍佇埕外；這是頭家設來鋸柴、搬徙柴箍，會當趁錢的傢俬頭，工人一日到暗，搬起搬落無閒咧起落柴，頭家不時佇工廠內面巡來巡去，無人有彼號膽去捒車仔來耍，準講有lang3縫咧閒，囡仔驚予人罵，仝款毋敢倚去耍；毋閣穡頭做會了，工人e晡五點定著會煞工，鋸台有歇睏的時陣，一直到六點欲食暗的進前，有一點鐘久的時間，囡仔會使捒車仔來耍，是上暢的好時陣。

Goan2 lau7-pe7 si7 ki3-bok8 kang-chhiunn2 e5 kang-lang5, kui-ke-khau2-a2 long2 toa3 ti7 kang-liau5 lai7-te2, bin7-thau5-cheng5 si7 khng3 chha5-khou e5 toa7-tiann5, u7 khou chit8 toa7 lin3-tng2 e5 thih-ki-lou7 kap khin-pian7-chhia ui5 ti7 tiann5-goa7; che si7 thau5-ke siat lai5 ki3-chha5, poann-soa2 chha5-khou, e7-tang3 than3-chinn5 e5 ke-si-thau5, kang-lang5 chit8 jit8 kau3 am3, poann khi2 poann loh8 bo5-eng5 leh khi2-loh8 chha5, thau5-ke put-si5 ti7 kang-chhiunn2 lai7-bin7 sun5 lai5 sun5 khi3, bo5 lang5 u7 hit ho7 tann2 khi3 sak chhia-a2 lai5 sng2, chun2-kong2 u7 lang3-phang7 leh eng5, gin2-a2 kiann hou7 lang5 me7, kang7-khoan2m7 kann2oa2 khi3 sng2; m7-koh sit-thau5 cho3 e7 liau2, kang-lang5 e-pou gou7 tiam2 tiann7-tioh8 e7 soah-kang, ki3-tai5 u7 hioh-khun3 e5 si5-chun7, it-tit8 kau3 lak8 tiam2 beh chiah8-am3 e5 chin3-cheng5, u7 chit8 tiam2-cheng ku2 e5 si5-kan, gin2-a2 e7-sai2 sak chhia-a2 lai5 sng2, si7 siong7 thiong3 e5 ho2 si5-chun7.

空的台車恬恬歇佇鐵枝路頂毋講話的時陣，會佇我的耳空邊，一陣一陣誠細聲共我喊講：「喂，緊來耍，換恁looh，緊來ooh！」；當然，我毋是臭耳聾，早就有聽著，是kan-tann欲等所有的工人齊走，聽袂著in噪人耳的教示，我才欲跳出來捒；毋但我，所有覕佇壁角的囡仔，一个一个趖趖趒出來；對工廠內面那講笑，那捒輕便車出去外口的柴埕，連鞭peh起去跳柴箍，隨閣傱落來欲jiok人，連鞭綴車走到喘袂離，倒佇台車頂面假睏；猶有攑柴枝仔徛佇柴箍頂，比過來sut過去，噓噓嘩嘩，全是囡仔聲；等到有人遠遠咧喊食暗，一个一个才踅倒轉去灶跤間，囡仔聲才勻勻仔恬去。

Khang e5 tai5-chhia tiam7-tiam7 hioh ti7 thih-ki-lou7 teng2 m7 kong2-oe7 e5 si5-chun7, e7 ti7 goa2 e5 hi7-khang pinn, chit8 chun7 chit8 chun7 chiann5 se3-siann ka7 goa2 hiam3 kong2: “Oeh, kin2 lai5 sng2, oann7 lin2--louh, kin2 lai5--ouh!”;tong-jian5, goa2m7 si7chhau3-hi7-lang5, cha2 to7 u7 thiann--tioh8, si7 kan-tann beh tan2 sou2-u7 e5 kang-lang5 chiau5 chau2, thiann be7 tioh8in chho3-lang5-hi7 e5 ka3-si7, goa2 chiah beh thiau3 chhutlai5 keng2; m7-na7 goa2, sou2-u7 bih ti7 piah-kak e5 gin2-a2, chit8 e5 chit8 e5 so5-so5 tio5--chhut-lai5; tui3 kang-chhiunn2 lai7-bin7 na2 kong2-chhio3, na2 keng2 khin-pian7-chhia chhut khi3 goa7-khau2 e5 chha5-tiann5, liam5-mi peh khi2khi3 thiau3 chha5-khou, sui5 koh chong5 loh8lai5 beh jiok lang5, liam5-mi toe3 chhia chau2 kau3 chhoan2 be7 li7, to2 ti7 tai5-chhia teng2-bin7 ke2-khun3; iau2 u7 giah8 chha5-ki-a2 khia7 ti7 chha5-khou teng2, pi2 koe3lai5 sut koe3khi3, hi-hi hoa-hoa, choan5 si7 gin2-a2 siann; tan2 kau3 u7 lang5 hng7-hng7 leh hiam3 chiah8-am3, chit8 e5 chit8 e5 chiah seh8 to3-tng2khi3 chau3-kha-keng, gin2-a2 siann chiah un5-un5-a2 tiam7--khi3.
對輕便鐵枝路的數念，予我後過較大漢的時，誠愛看火車、坐火車，譀甲若拄著摻火車有牽連的代誌，我攏會斟酌去看、去關心。踮八堵讀初中三冬、台北讀高中通車一年，逐工坐火車咧起起落落、佇車廂內底啄龜、看冊、聽鐵枝路聲，身軀綴車廂咧搖來搖去，若親像細漢的時陣，坐佇輕便台車頂彼種感覺，有講袂出喙的一種爽快纏佇頭殼內，滿足甲心花一直開，喙角微微仔笑。

Tui3 khin-pian7 thih-ki-lou7 e5 siau3-liam7, hou7 goa2 au7-koe3 khah toa7-han3 e5 si5, chiann5 ai3 khoann3 hoe2-chhia, che7 hoe2-chhia, ham3 kah na7 tu2 tioh8 chham hoe2-chhia u7 khan-lian5 e5 tai7-chi3, goa2 long2 e7 chim-chiok khi3 khoann3, khi3 koan-sim. Tiam3 Peh-tou2 thak8 chhou-tiong sann tang, Tai5-pak thak8 ko-tiong thong-chhia chit8 ni5, tak8 kang che7 hoe2-chhia leh khi2-khi2-loh8-loh8, ti7 chhia-siunn lai7-te2 tok-ku, khoann3 chheh, thiann thih-ki-lou7 siann, sin-khu toe3 chhia-siunn leh io5 lai5 io5 khi3, na2 chhin-chhiunn7 se3-han3 e5 si5-chun7, che7 ti7 khin-pian7 tai5-chhia teng2 hit chiong2 kam2-kak, u7 kong2 be7 chhut-chhui3 e5 chit8 chiong2 song2-khoai3 tinn5 ti7 thau5-khak lai7, boan2-chiok kah sim-hoe it-tit8 khui, chhui3-kak bi5-bi5-a2 chhio3.

心理分析的老師父—『佛洛伊德』（S. Freud， 一九五六～一九三九），捌寫過一本冊號做“Three Essays on the Theory of Sexuality”，內底有一篇“Mechanical exitation”，有講著細漢囡仔足愛人共伊的身軀掠起來弄振動；譬論講，搖、幌，hiat起去半空中，一遍閣一遍笑甲咯咯叫，有一種誠爽、誠暢的感覺，咱就會當知影囡仔足佮意「機械性、規律性」的刺激，親像倒佇搖籃內予老母輕輕仔搖，誠緊伊就睏ka-tsue7去矣，啊若較大漢的囡仔興看、興坐馬車、火車，嘛是這个緣故；致使足濟查poo人，佇伊做囡仔的時代，有一暫仔會下願想欲去駛火車、貨櫃車、馬車，會對所有唅鐵枝路、火車母有牽連的代誌去做、去問、去關心，攏是這種心理咧作怪。應該就是這種緣故，我細漢愛耍輕便鐵枝路、愛捒台車、看火車，較大一絲仔，拄好有機會通用身軀去享受搖、幌的趣味，自按呢愈坐愈興，坐久kan-tann會啄龜nia5，袂感覺悿；亦有可能是細漢生活佇有輕便台車的鋸木工廠，有這款環境所致，閣紲落去大漢讀冊坐四冬的火車，逐工透早到暗起起落落，若講對火車無感情，絕對是白賊。

Sim-li2 hun-sek e5 lau7 sai-hu7----『佛洛伊德』(S. Freud, it-kiu2-gou2-liok8 ~ it-kiu2-sam-kiu2), bat sia2 koe3 chit8 pun2 chheh ho7-cho3 “Three Essays on the Theory of Sexuality”, lai7-te2 u7 chit8 phinn “Mechanical exitation”, u7 kong2 tioh8 se3-han3 gin2-a2 chiok ai3 lang5 ka7 i e5 sin-khu liah8 khi2lai5 lang7 tin2-tang7; phi3-lun7 kong2, io5, hainn3, hiat khi2khi3 poann3-khong tiong, chit8 pian3 koh chit8 pian3 chhio3 kah kok8-kok8-kio3, u7 chit8 chiong2chiann5 song2, chiann5 thiong3 e5 kam2-kak, lan2 to7 e7-tang3 chai-iann2 gin2-a2 chiok kah-i3 “ki-hai5-seng3, kui-lut8-seng3” e5 chhi3-kek, chhin-chhiunn7 to2 ti7 io5-na5 lai7 hou7 lau7-bu2 khin-khin-a2 io5, chiann5 kin2 i to7 khun3 ka-choe7--khi3-a, ah8 na7 khah toa7-han3 e5 gin2-a2 heng3 khoann3, heng3 che7 be2-chhia, hoe2-chhia, ma7 si7 chit e5 ian5-kou3; ti3-su2 chiok che7 cha-pou-lang5, ti7 i cho3 gin2-a2 e5 si5-tai7, u7 chit8-cham7-a2 e7 he7-goan7 siunn7 beh khi3 sai2 hoe2-chhia, hoe3-kui7-chhia, be2-chhia, e7 tui3 sou2-u7 ham7 thih-ki-lou7, hoe2-chhia-bu2 u7 khan-lian5 e5 tai7-chi3 khi3 cho3, khi3 mng7, khi3 koan-sim, long2 si7 chit chiong2 sim-li2 leh chok-koai3. Eng-kai to7 si7 chit chiong2 ian5-kou3, goa2 se3-han3 ai3 sng2 khin-pian7 thih-ki-lou7, ai3 keng2 tai5-chhia, khoann3 hoe2-chhia, khah toa7 chit8-si-a2, tu2-ho2 u7 ki-hoe7 thang iong7 sin-khu khi3 hiang2-siu7 io5, hainn3 e5 chhu3-bi7, chu7 an2-ne ju2 che7 ju2 heng3, che7 ku2 kan-tann e7 tok-ku nia5, be7 kam2-kak thiam2; ia7 u7 kho2-leng5 si7 se3-han3 seng-oah8 ti7 u7 khin-pian7 tai5-chhia e5 ki3-bok8 kang-chhiunn2, u7 chit khoan2 khoan5-keng2 sou2-ti3, koh soa3--loh8-khi3 toa7-han3 thak8-chheh che7 si3 tang e5 hoe2-chhia, tak8 kang thau3-cha2 kau3 am3 khi2-khi2-loh8-loh8, na7 kong2 tui3 hoe2-chhia bo5 kam2-cheng5, choat8-tui3 si7 peh8-chhat8.

講著「火炭」，tsit-ma2的少年囡仔，因為罕得看著，連火炭生做啥乜款，大部分攏無啥印象矣！莫怪啦！現代人本底就足少用火炭咧煮飯抑ue肉，年仔節仔若全家出去外口tshit迌、烘肉攏共細的gas爐紥佇身邊，啊若無紥「原子炭」（柴），彼是一種用杉仔灰摻雕刻賰的柴屑仔揉做伙，用機械壓製成的燃火柴。甚至嘛有都市囡仔，掠準講火炭是發佇thoo5跤面，抑是對thoo5跤發出來的，煞毋知影講火炭是共樹木囥入去窯內底烘燒成的一種「炭」。

Kong2 tioh8 “hoe2-thoann3”, chit-ma2 e5 siau3-lian5 gin2-a2, in-ui7 han2-tit khoann3--tioh8, lian7 hoe2-thoann3 senn-cho3 siann2-mih khoan2, toa7 pou7-hun7 long2 bo5 siann2 in3-siong2--a! 我的故鄉—田寮，東爿以烏山山脈佮旗山鎮為界，西爿是以大崗山摻阿蓮鄉，佮岡山鎮為界，南爿是以阿公店溪佮伊的頂游—旺萊溪摻燕巢鄉為界，北爿以Au-ang溪佮台南縣龍崎鄉相對，面積有九千兩百六拾八點○二公頃（參一个澎湖縣全縣的面積平大），毋閣，因為鄉內的山崙仔濕黏thoo5的土壤較濟；無，就是親像「月世界」彼種惡地形（硬佮鹼的海仁土），所以會當耕作的面積相對就較少，kan-tann有一千兩百○八點二十八公頃爾爾，出產的果子仔除了龍眼、那茇仔、芎蕉摻棗仔以外，在地人普遍以耕作雜糧抑是手工編製藤仔類的日常傢俱用品做副業，其他就無啥乜經濟價值較懸的農作物啦。

Goa2 e5 kou3-hiong----Chhan5-liau5, tang-peng5 i2 Ou-soann-soann-meh8 kap Ki5-san-tin3 ui5 kai3, sai-peng5 si7 i2 Toa7-kong-san chham A-lian5-hiong, kap Kong-san-tin3 ui5 kai3, lam5-peng5 si7 i2 A-kong-tiam3-khe kap i e5 teng2-iu5----Ong7-lai5-khe chhamIan3-cho5-hiong ui5 kai3, pak-peng5 i2 Au-ang-khe kap Tai5-lam5-koan7 Liong5-kia7-hiong sio-tui3, bian7-chek u7 kau2-chheng nng7-pah lak8-chap8-peh tiam2 khong3-ji7 kong-kheng2 (chham chit8 e5 Phenn5-ou5-koan7 choan5-koan7 e5 bian7-chek penn5 toa7), m7-koh, in-ui7 hiong lai7 e5 soann-lun7-a2 sip-liam5-thou5 e5 thou2-jiong2 khah che7; bo5, to7 si7 chhin-chhiunn7 “Goat8-se3-kai3” hit chiong2 ok-te7-heng5 (nge7 kap kiam5 e5 hai2-jin5-thou5), sou2-i2 e7-tang3 keng-chok e5 bian7-chek siong-tui3 to7 khah chio2, kan-tann u7 chit8-chheng nng7-pah khong3-peh tiam2ji7-chap8-peh kong-kheng2 nia7-nia7, chhut-san2 e5 koe2-chi2-a2 tu5-liau2 geng5-geng2, nia2-poat8-a2, kin-chio chham cho2-a2 i2-goa7, chai7-te7-lang5 phou2-phian3 i2 keng-chok chap8-niu5iah si7chhiu2-kang pian-che3 tin5-a2-lui7 e5 jit8-siong5 ka-ku7 iong7-phin2 cho3 hu3-giap8, ki5-thann to7 bo5 siann2-mih keng-che3 ke3-tat8 khah koan5 e5 long5-chok-but8--lah.

阮鄉境內的樹種，以龍眼欉摻烏相思仔欉上濟，閣來就是天然的柚木（胭脂欉）佮竹仔林，講著龍眼欉佮烏相思仔欉，因為伊的材質硬閣容易toh8，是燒火炭上好的樹木，若共樹仔 剉落來（或者是欲嫁接較好肉的果子仔品種，共樹仔鋸斷，賰成丈懸），澹柴貿人（大約估一个價數買賣），一台斤差不多一箍外銀爾爾，毋閣，若烘燒做火炭了後，一台斤就起價到欲成十箍，這是三十外冬前的行情，tsit-ma2咧，澹柴毋免貿，主人家tsong7仔免費共柴送你，毋閣你著愛替主人家嫁接果子仔欉做交換，啊若講著現此時的炭的價數，小賣一台斤差不多十四、五箍銀，若大量買，當然價數會當抽退，較俗淡薄仔，為著增加收入，鄉民就以「燒火炭」做行業。

Goan2 hiong-keng2 lai7 e5 chhiu7-cheng2, i2 geng5-geng2 chang5 chham ou-chiunn-si-a2chang5 siong7 che7, koh lai5 to7 si7 thian-jian5 e5 iu7-bok8 (ian-chi chang5) kap tek-a2-na5, kong2 tioh8 geng5-geng2 chang5 kap ou-chiunn-si-a2 chang5, in-ui7 i e5 chai5-chit teng7 koh iong5-inn7 toh8, si7 sio hoe2-thoann3 siong7 ho2 e5 chhiu7-bok8, na7 ka7 chhiu7-a2 chho3--loh8-lai5 (hek8-chia2 si7 beh ke3-chiap khah ho2-bah e5 koe2-chi2-a2 phin2-cheng2, ka7 chhiu7-a2 ki3 tng7, chhun chiann5-tng7 koan5), tam5-chha5 bauh8--lang5 (tai7-iok kou2 chit8 e5 ke3-siau3 be2-be7), chit8 tai5-kin chha-put-to chit8 khou goa7 gin5 nia7-nia7, m7-koh, na7 hang-sio cho3 hoe2-thoann3 liau2-au7, chit8 tai5-kin to7 khi2-ke3 kau3 beh chiann5 chap8 khou, che si7 sann-chap8 goa7 tang cheng5 e5 hang5-cheng5, chit-ma2--leh, tam5-chha5m7 bian2bauh8, chu2-lang5-ke chong7-a2 bian2-hui3 ka7 chha5 sang3--li2, m7-koh li2 tioh8-ai3 the3 chu2-lang5-ke ke3-chiap koe2-chi2-a2 chang5 cho3 kau-oann7, ah8 na7 kong2 tioh8 hian7-chhu2-si5 e5 thoann3 e5 ke3-siau3, sio2-be7 chit8 tai5-kin chha-put-to chap8-si3, gou7 khou gin5, na7 toa7-liong7 be2, tong-jian5 ke3-siau3 e7-tang3 thiu-the3, khah siok8--tam7-poh8-a2, ui7 tioh8 cheng-ka siu-jip8, hiong-bin5 to7 i2 “sio-hoe2-thoann3” cho3 hang5-giap8.

燒火炭，必然愛有火炭窯，佇阮鄉，火炭窯以田寮村佮七星村山區部落較濟，亦就是地號名號做「大坵園」、「田草埔」佮「祖師田」、「南勢湖」這幾个部落的山路邊；火炭窯大部分攏起佇較閃風的山塌窯的頂頭成半圓形，直徑大約二丈，親像「蒙古包」的形，每一座窯差不多二丈懸。留兩个空口，一个窯門做圓拱形，大約七尺懸，三尺闊，這是欲運送剉落來的樹木，佮拆封窯口運搬出火炭的出入口。另外一个空口較細，外口面半圓形，差不多有尺半的半徑，底面較闊，遮的空是欲燃火用的，遮的細个空喙頂頭有留一个空通對另外彼爿較闊、原先疊柴的窯室，利便予細窯空燃火所產生的煙透過兩爿相通的空，共疊佇隔壁大窯室內底的柴製造成火炭。

燒火炭的工人，普遍攏kan-tann穿內裌仔佮粗衫褲，肩胛頭thenn3一副柴舉仔（用兩支手骨遐粗的Y字型樹椏交叉縛做伙），共大窯室硩疊約八分滇，才閣用石頭摻澹thoo5糜共大窯空封密，而且開始用一thah8一thah8縛好的焦樹葉，點予toh8，ui3細的窯空送入去，暝日相紲直直燃，按呢連紲燃差不多成工，就會使得封窯欲燃幾工，看窯的大空喙疊的石頭縫的thoo5糜來斷定，澹的thoo5糜對頂懸勻勻a2向thoo5跤面焦，這个過程差不多需要七～十工，等候thoo5糜焦到離thoo5跤面量其約半尺的時陣，就會使封窯矣（大細窯空攏封密）。差不多封兩禮拜，窯內底的柴已經成做火炭，就會當出（開窯喙）窯矣。
